Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2008 09:26AM pam2 wrote: I started chemo begining of oct.  Everyone reacts different to chemo.  I think it also depends on what chemo they are going to use.   I'm done with the first set Adriamycian and Cytoxin.  I did very well on this.  Just felt a little nausea.  If I kept food in me I was fine.  Only had to take my Anti-nausea pills twice.  I will be starting on Taxotere and Herceptive 3 days before Christmas.  I've heard Taxotere has more side-effects.  I feel the same way.  I just pray a lot!!!  I'm also eating everything organic (as much as possible) and cut out sugar.  I heard this feeds the cancer.
Posts.Title: Has anyone started a forum for Chemo in Dec 2008? horsercn Texas357
